event.description: Skip Schumaker hits a ground-rule double (7) on a fly ball down the left-field line.
Colby Rasmus hits a sacrifice bunt. Throwing error by pitcher Edinson Volquez. Skip Schumaker scores. Colby Rasmus to 2nd.
Albert Pujols flies out to center fielder Willy Taveras. Colby Rasmus to 3rd.
Ryan Ludwick called out on strikes.
Chris Duncan strikes out swinging.
Yadier Molina flies out softly to right fielder Jay Bruce.
Khalil Greene strikes out swinging.
Brian Barden flies out to right fielder Jay Bruce.
Adam Wainwright strikes out swinging.
Skip Schumaker doubles (8) on a soft line drive to center fielder Willy Taveras.
Colby Rasmus singles on a ground ball to center fielder Willy Taveras. Skip Schumaker scores.
Albert Pujols walks. Colby Rasmus to 2nd.
Ryan Ludwick strikes out swinging.
Chris Duncan doubles (10) on a line drive to center fielder Willy Taveras. Colby Rasmus scores. Albert Pujols scores.

Khalil Greene flies out to center fielder Willy Taveras.

Defensive switch from first base to catcher for Ramon Hernandez.

Yadier Molina singles on a ground ball to left fielder Laynce Nix. Ryan Ludwick scores. Chris Duncan to 2nd.

Joe Thurston walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Todd Wellemeyer replaces Ryan Franklin.
Todd Wellemeyer strikes out on a missed bunt.

Colby Rasmus doubles (5) on a line drive to center fielder Willy Taveras. Joe Thurston scores. Colby Rasmus out at 3rd, center fielder Willy Taveras to second baseman Brandon Phillips to third baseman Adam Rosales.
